description: Learn how to show your work with the MERCURY framework. This open-source tool perfectly matches your computed notebook (e.g., written in Jupyter Notebook). Without knowledge of frontend technologies, you can present your results as a web app (with interactive widgets), report, dashboard, or report. Learn how to improve your notebook and make your work understandable for non-technical mates. Python only!
title: From Complex Scientific Notebook to User-Friendly Web Application
